verses.verse: And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> who was of the <S%H4480>inhabitants<s%> <S%H8453><s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> there shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to my <S%H1697>word.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Get <S%H1980><s%> thee <S%H4480>hence,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and <S%H6437>turn<s%> thee <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> and hide <S%H5641>thyself<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4480>brook;<s%> <S%H5158><s%> and I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> to <S%H3557>feed<s%> thee <S%H8033>there.<s%>

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and he <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5158>brook.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7093><s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that the <S%H5158>brook<s%> dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there had <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> <S%H1980>get<s%> thee to <S%H6886>Zarephath,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongeth to <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H3557>sustain<s%> thee.

So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath.<s%> And when he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7197>gathering<s%> of <S%H6086>sticks:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Fetch<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And as she was <S%H1980>going<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it, he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Bring<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H518>not<s%> a <S%H4580>cake,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> a <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> in a <S%H3537>barrel,<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> in a <S%H6835>cruse:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6086>sticks,<s%> that I may go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H6213>dress<s%> it for me and my <S%H1121>son,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> it, and <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not;<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as thou hast <S%H1697>said:<s%> <S%H389>but<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H4480>thereof<s%> <S%H8033><s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5692>cake<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> it unto me, and <S%H314>after<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> for thee and for thy <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3615>waste,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>fail,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sendeth<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And she <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah:<s%> and <S%H1931>she,<s%> and <S%H1931>he,<s%> and her <S%H1004>house,<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> many <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And the <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> <S%H3615>wasted<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>fail,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> fell <S%H2470>sick;<s%> and his <S%H2483>sickness<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H2389>sore,<s%> <S%H5704>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5397>breath<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in him.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I to do with thee, O thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God?<s%> art thou <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H853>call<s%> my <S%H5771>sin<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> and to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> thy <S%H1121>son.<s%> And he <S%H3947>took<s%> him out of her <S%H4480>bosom,<s%> <S%H2436><s%> and carried him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H5944>loft,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3427>abode,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him <S%H5921>upon<s%> his own <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> hast thou <S%H1571>also<s%> brought <S%H7489>evil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn,<s%> by <S%H4191>slaying<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And he stretched <S%H4058>himself<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3206>child's<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> come into him <S%H7725>again.<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7130><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah;<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> came into him <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7130><s%> and he <S%H2421>revived.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5944>chamber<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him unto his <S%H517>mother:<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2416>liveth.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> by <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H571>truth.<s%>
